componentInstanceProperties.name: IntroText
componentInstanceProperties.value: Join Australia’s fastest growing Naturally Sugar Free brand

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Key Investment Highlights

NEXBA investment is on the table again. Here’s why…

Due to phenomenal growth in APAC and EMEA markets since the last capital raise, the company is looking to capitalise on this momentum to fast-track its global expansion.

If you are an existing investor, this an exciting time to get back in and increase your allocation.

Not a NEXBA investor yet? This is a unique opportunity to back the newly formed GoodSweet® Group which now underpins NEXBA, the #1 global naturally sugar-free brand in beverages powered by their now patented proprietary ‘GoodSweet®’ Sweetener.

Key wins since their last capital raise with VentureCrowd


  • 55% net sales growth forecast in FY22A driven by further wins in core customer Sainsbury’s and expansion into wider Grocery, Convenience and Food Service channels throughout Europe.
  • In Q4, NEXBA is launching its new non-alcoholic spritz range in Australia (Amalfi Spritz and Limoncello Spritz), first to market in 54% Coles stores plus on NEXBA’s online store.
  • Significant European Distributor Expansion: NEXBA Kombucha is now live on-shelf in Carrefour (#1 France Retailer) and distribution agreements are signed with distribution plans underway in Denmark, Norway, Sweden, Poland, Netherlands, Finland and Ireland.
  • Petty Wood Ltd, their UK distributor, is now a new lead investor, enhancing national warehousing, distribution and multi-channel marketing (representing over 2000 brands) capabilities across the UK.
  • First to launch new Natural Energy Drink Innovation in Holland and Barrett and Sainsbury’s – 4700+ points of distribution.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The Offer

The Offer: Become a shareholder in Nexba for only $5,000 minimum investment! VentureCrowd has an allocation of up to A$5,000,000 for fully paid ordinary shares in Nexba at A$1.28 per share. Nexba’s Series B raise represents a $45M pre-money valuation, up from $20M in their last priced round.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Growth Strategy

NEXBA is one of the fastest growing Naturally Sugar Free brands. The business was founded with NEXBA in traditional beverage categories such as soft drink and iced tea. However, it has experienced significant success in Kombucha and other emerging beverage categories including its new natural Energy Drinks launched in the UK and the upcoming Spritz range about to be launched in Australia.

NEXBA’s first product beyond beverages, “Liquid Brekkie,” has outperformed sales expectations to date, with strong brand recognition and clear cross-product consumer purchasing plans to further expand its “beyond beverage offering.” NEXBA’s proprietary Naturally Sugar Free GoodSweet® Sweetener now with patent secured in Australia, enables further platform expansion.

The Business has continued to deliver impressive financial performance and global expansion. Relevantly, FY22 (June) net sales were ~A$32.5m, with clear line of sight to A$36m net sales in FY23 (despite impacts from COVID and Floods in Australia). NEXBA is now firmly established in Australia and the UK with recent (active) distribution agreements unlocking other European and Asian market expansion and their Kombucha product already on-shelf in Carrefour, France’s #1 grocery chain.

With enhanced manufacturing and distribution capabilities already underway in EMEA and APAC, and the establishment of the Goodsweet® Group to support multi-market and multi-category growth, this capital raise extension offers the business the opportunity to pursue a bolder business plan, to focus on delivering profitability in each division sooner and, ultimately, create a stronger Group platform that will unlock greater value and liquidity options for all shareholders over time.

To date Nexba has removed close to 5 billion grams of sugar and counting!

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Use of Funds & Exit Strategy

This extension of their ‘Series B’ capital raise offers the business time to execute on its Business Plan, to focus on delivering profitability in each division and ultimately create a stronger Goodsweet® Group platform that will unlock greater value and liquidity options for all shareholders over time.

The Founders' ambition is to continue to drive the business into the next phase, further driving internal governance & management expertise to enhance accountability & performance in both mitigation of risks & unlocking of opportunities.

They are now pursuing a short-term capital raise from a targeted group of existing shareholders and select aligned new investors who would represent minority investors in the group.

Nexba plans to return to the capital market at a superior valuation once they deliver on the initiatives outlined in the use of proceeds. They anticipate this to be a 2-3 year horizon & it is at this point that they expect the opportunity for a significant liquidity event for investors.

To this end, Founders Troy Douglas & Drew Bilbe, would value your support in participating in this exciting impact business.

Read more in this recent article by The Australian Financial Review.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
What is Nexba?

Nexba is Australia’s leading all natural, sugar free and Aussie made drinks brand, on a mission to create innovative drinks that are not only good for you but taste epic too.

Founded by two Australian brothers-in-law, Troy Douglas and Drew Bilbe, in their early twenties, Nexba has become one of Australia’s most well-known success stories. Starting off selling their original drinks from the back of a van on Bondi Beach, Nexba is now stocked in all major Australian retailers and has made its way onto supermarket shelves in the UK, Europe, New Zealand and South Korea.

The innovative duo spent six long years perfecting Goodsweet®, their Natural Sweetener Blend that matches the taste and feel of sugar better than anything else on the market. It’s down to this that the Aussie Boys have grown such a loyal and devoted Nexba fan base over the years.

Nexba is dedicated to doing sugar free differently. They’re on a mission to rid the world of sugar and artificial ingredients, creating drinks that are all natural, sugar free and taste good.

And Aussie’s have jumped on board. Nexba has been tracking its impact by recording how much sugar Aussie’s have avoided. As of June 2022, Nexba has officially removed 5 BILLION grams of sugar.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Problem and Market

Since the industrial revolution, prevalence of sugar and artificial sweeteners in the diets of people around the world has skyrocketed.

Consumption of sugar has been associated with an increased risk of Type 2 diabetes, cardiovascular diseases and cancer, costing the economy billions of dollars in direct and indirect costs including lost productivity.

This hike in sugar consumption has led to critical societal and health problem. In 2018, an estimated 1.2 million Australian children and adolescents were overweight or obese (~25%) and around 12.5 million adults, or ~67% (Source: aihw.gov.au).

Fortunately, consumers are waking up and demanding better-for-you food and beverage products that promote good health and reduce the impact on the planet.

Nexba is positioned to capitalise on global mega trends impacting the packaged food and beverage landscape:

Food as Medicine


Consumers are becoming more aware of the health risks associated with sugary and processed foods and shifting to better-for-you alternatives.

Functional Benefits


To avoid foods associated with dietary risks, consumers are increasingly seeking nutrient‐dense, natural foods that provide functional benefits for their health.

Natural & Clean Label


Consumers are increasingly favouring foods and beverages made with all‐natural ingredients free from artificials.

Conscious Consumption


Consumers are connecting with brands who align to their values, and take responsibility for impact on people and planet

Since 2010, Nexba has been on a mission to rid the world of sugar and artificial ingredients. Sugar avoidance has become a mainstream consumer behaviour, and artificial ingredients are yet to be exposed and put in the spotlight. There is overwhelming consumer demand for products that support a healthier lifestyle, yet this comes with high expectations – why does making positive food and beverage choices have to come at the expense of great taste? This is where Nexba and their unique proprietary ‘Goodsweet’ natural sweetener comes in.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The Nexba Solution

Nexba does sugar free differently, with a range of delicious products that are all natural and completely sugar free. The promise of guilt free enjoyment connects with a consumer mindset that is universal across demographics, life-stage groups, beverage needs and occasions.

Brand Authenticity multinationals can’t replicate


Consumers are turning away from multinationals offering sub-standard faux-health alternatives while Nexba has clear and consistent product promises for consumers. Australia is a country with world-class quality and a wholesome approach with an excellent and enforced quality control regime.

Nexba reinforces the “Australian innovation” quality tag with the “underdog” image of a young, dynamic and high growth company. Identifying with consumers, the “Aussie Born. Locally Made” authenticity of the founders reflects this ‘no worries mate’ and ‘Naturally Brave’ mantra perfectly.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
.  

.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Competitive Advantage

All Nexba products are made naturally delicious by Goodsweet®. Six years in the making, Goodsweet ® is Nexba’s all natural, plant based sweetener blend that replicates the sugar curve and taste experience of sugar.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Nexba ‘GoodSweet®’ – Our Proprietary Sweetener Blend

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
• Having spent years innovating with natural ingredients (including natural receptor modulators) in small proportions, Nexba has closed the gap, achieving an unparalleled full flavour profile that is all natural and free from any artificial additives.
  • Nexba Goodsweet® is fully transferable to other Food & Beverage products with the same outcomes around sweetness, mouthfeel and aftertaste, allowing Nexba to become the #1 Global Naturally Sugar Free Platform.
  • Nexba Goodsweet® has already gained an Australian Innovation Patented and is patent pending in future key growth markets.
  • Nexba continues to invest in and lead the development of the next generation of ‘Goodsweet®’ including an ongoing strategic patenting process.
  • Nexba's IP is owned and protected under the Nexba Pty Ltd entity.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Why Invest Through VentureCrowd?

VentureCrowd is the leading digital investment platform for alternative assets. We find and fund the brightest and most innovative startups.

Our curation and due diligence is rigorous and our track record of success speaks for itself:

  • Only digital investment platform in Australia to have successfully delivered exit returns to investors through equity crowdfunding.

  • 68K+ members and counting.

  • Over $250,000,000 in capital raised since inception.

VentureCrowd is investor-led, which means we only list deals with secured professional external lead investors. Our investors then invest on the same economic terms as professional investors. If you invest in one of our deals you will receive equity or ownership in the company that is raising the capital. Not only will your investment come with lower fees and capital commitments, but it will also come with reduced deal complexity, and you’ll have access to alternative equity, property and credit opportunities on the same terms as professional lead investors.

Invest now

If you would prefer to speak to one of our team members about this offer, please:

  • Book a call or

  • call us on 1300 039 655

Please note, the Fund Manager reserves the right to vary or cancel the Offer at any time, vary the amount raised under the Offer, vary or waive the Minimum Investment and close the Offer, without notice and without giving reasons.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Fees

Investors invest through a VentureCrowd Trust, which is managed as a single asset by VentureCrowd. We don’t charge any annual management fee to investors, rather we only charge a performance fee where an exit delivers profit, thereby aligning ourselves with the outcomes for investors.

  • Contribution Fee: 1.1% This is the fee charged by the Trustee for the establishment of the Trust and the purchasing entity, structuring the overall investment and raising capital by way of issue of Units. Payable upon acceptance of your investment by the Trustee.
  • Management Fee: 1.65% per annum (charged upon conversion or exit).
  • Performance Fee: 20% of the profit (charged upon conversion or exit).
